name: Odia GK App - Odia General Knowledge
description: This is a small App which will help you to learn Odia General Knowledge.   In this Odia GK App we have covered below topics:  1. Odia GK (General Knowledge) Questions 2. Odisha History Knowledge Questions 3. Odisha Geography Knowledge Questions 4. Indian History Questions 5. Questions on National Symbols 6. Questions on Constitution of india 7. World Quiz. 8. Questions on Important Days  We hope you like this App and Rate our App. If you need more do contact us.
